Question
========

A person achieves a score of 13 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 10.6 with a standard deviation 1.9. The z-score of the person with 13 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.09
* 1.26
* 1.3

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.09: Incorrect
* 1.26: Correct
* 1.3: Incorrect
